txt.en: You are to wait a span of three days. By that time, the small force will have made its way along the riverside, and come to their outpost from behind. When three days are up, we will have gained entrance to the outpost in secret and slaughtered the defenders. None will suspect an attack so far from our main presence, and from the rear. After the rout, for rout it will be, we will meet in a pincer attack, and the main force can come through.\n\n
